subtitleNullable: Daily Updated SQLite Database — 64,000+ Games, 4800+ Players, and 30 Teams 🏀
descriptionNullable:
Welcome to the NBA Database! 👋 🏀 ⛹️‍♂️

This dataset is updated daily and includes: - **30** teams - **4800+** players - **65,000+** games (every game since the inaugural 1946-47 NBA season) - **Box Scores** for over 95% of all games - **Play-by-Play** game data with ***13M+ rows*** of Play-by-Play data in all! --- - See [here](https://www.kaggle.com/wyattowalsh/using-sql) for tips on using SQL with this database - [daily updater notebook](https://www.kaggle.com/code/wyattowalsh/database-updater-daily) and [monthly updater notebook](https://www.kaggle.com/code/wyattowalsh/database-updater-monthly) ⮕ View the associated GitHub repo and [code base docs site 📄](https://nba-db.readthedocs.io/) ⮕ Sponsor project: ---
Built With:
